name: Teiler
tagline: Little script for screenshots and screencasts utilizing rofi, maim, ffmpeg
body:
### Features

* Create Screenshots and Screencasts
 * from screen(s)
 * from area
 * with delay
* Upload
 * to your own ssh server
 * to a filebin server
 * to imgur
* Browse History and
 * view images/videos
 * edit images and
 * re-upload
```
### Installation
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
